column4: Anyone? -->  I'm trying to get SLAB installed.  I followed the apt-get route (as listed here https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Slab). It seemed to complete OK, but there is no change (i.e. no slab).  Any Clues?
did you add it to your panel?
right click panel in gnome and choose the one for slab
thats what i was looking for - thanks
